title: Ford Brings Back Community Challenge for Students of Historically Black Colleges and Universities (Ford Motor ...
text: ( Source : Ford Motor Company ) Ford Motor Company and Ford Motor Company Fund have joined forces with the Tom Joyner Morning Show and Rickey Smiley Morning Show for the third year to launch the 2015 Ford HBCU Community Challenge Ford supports
